channel.title: How to change were you start a new account [508]
channel.description: were do i change were you start out when you first login? =S

item.title: How to change were you start a new account [508]
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

You didnt mention what base but use your brain to adabpt.

Go to the Login.java folder in Src -> palidino76 -> Rs2 -> io -> Login.java

After that seach if (p.teleportToX == -1 && p.teleportToY == -1) {

Below that should be something like p.setCoords(X, Y, 0);

Just change the x to the absX were you want to login at and the Y to the absY were you want to login at. Compile and done.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change were you start a new account [508]
